---
title: "Topics"
listing:
  - id: pinned
    contents: "../posts/**/*.ipynb"
    include: 
      pinned: true
    sort: "date asc"
    type: default
    categories: true

  - id: recent
    contents: "../posts/**/*.ipynb"
    exclude:
      pinned: true
    sort: "date desc"
    type: default
    categories: true
---
